info.description: APIs to create and manage Request to Pay payments in order to create, view, update, block and decline the payment requests from both Biller and Payer systems
info.title: Request to Pay Payment services

put.summary: Request the biller for an extension of the payment due date
put.description: Enables the payer to request the biller for a new due date in the future for the biller's payment request

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The guarantees issuance id initiated by internet banking

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.summary: Decline the payment request from biller
put.description: Enables the payer to decline the biller's payment request when payer does not want make any payment towards that request

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The guarantees issuance id initiated by internet banking

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.summary: Update the messages sent to biller by payer
put.description: Enables the payer to send messages to biller when the payer requires further information regarding a specific payment request

put.description: Enables the payer to modify the amount requested by biller, if modification is allowed by the respective scheme

put.description: Enables the payer to decline the biller's payment request and block the biller when payer does not want make any payment towards that biller

get.summary: Retrieves the payment requests for which extension have been granted
get.description: Retrieves the payers payments requests for which the due date extensions have been granted by the biller

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: Represents the scheme (a synonym for the National ID type) under which the National ID is defined

parameters.name: currentState
parameters.description: Contains the current state of the transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the billers payment requests which are pending to be acknowledged
get.description: Retrieves the payment requests which are yet to be acknowledged by the biller. Generally, Partially paid or Paid are the two statuses with which the biller acknowledges the payer

post.summary: Payment request initiation for UK scheme from biller to payer system
post.description: Creates payment request for UK scheme. This API can be linked to any published API which is in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards

parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.summary: Manages payment requests for UK scheme between biller and payer systems
put.description: Update payment request onto the biller system from payer to support partial payment, full payment, due date extension request , decline and block the biller, decline the payment request and messages sent to the biller. Similarly, update payment request onto the payer system from biller to support approval of due date extension, rejection of due date extension, messages sent to the payer and acknowledgement to payer.This API can be linked to any published API which is in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The guarantees issuance id initiated by internet banking

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.summary: Update the full or partial acknowledgement in a payment request
put.description: Enables the biller to send full acknowledgement to payer when payer paid full amount and send partial acknowledgement to payer when payer paid partial amount

payerBuildingNumber.description: Contains the building number of the payer

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

paymentStatus.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

errorDetails.description: Error details of the Bundle account

errorDetail.description: Error details of the Bundle account

basketReferences.description: Indicates the identifier of the basket to be displayed on the biller's portal and paid by the payer

basketReference.description: Indicates the identifier of the basket to be displayed on the biller's portal and paid by the payer

requestorUrls.description: Contains the URL of the requestor which allows the payer to access the portal of the requestor

requestorUrl.description: Contains the URL of the requestor which allows the payer to access the portal of the requestor

amountValueDates.description: Value date on which the amount was settled/ unsettled

amountValueDate.description: Value date on which the amount was settled/ unsettled

additionalInformationToRequestor.description: Contains the additional information that is sent to requestor by the payer

notesToPayers.description: Contains any notes sent to the payer by the requestor

notesToPayer.description: Contains any notes sent to the payer by the requestor

requestorName.description: Contains the name of the requestor

zeroNoRecords.description: zero records display for NOFILE (an enquiry does not exist in a single file) enquiry for online upgrade

payerName.description: Contains the name of the payer

amountModifiedByPayer.description: Indicates the amount modified by the payer in contrast to the instructed amount

instructedAmount.description: Specifies the amount which is allocated or instructed for the account reference included in the selection for a specific transaction.

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

receivedDate.description: Identifies the date on which the document was received

requestedExecutionDate.description: Indicates the date at which the payment needs to be executed as requested by the Requestor

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

rejectReasonCode.description: Indicates the reject reason code of the payment for which the recall has been rejected

requestedExpiryDate.description: Contains the expiry date of the request to pay message

status.description: The status of the early maturity request

additionalInformationToRequestor.description: Contains the additional information that is sent to requestor by the payer

notesToRequestors.description: Contains any notes sent to the requestor by the payer

notesToRequestor.description: Contains any notes sent to the requestor by the payer

notesToPayers.description: Contains any notes sent to the payer by the requestor

notesToPayer.description: Contains any notes sent to the payer by the requestor

payerName.description: Contains the name of the payer

zeroNoRecords.description: zero records display for NOFILE (an enquiry does not exist in a single file) enquiry for online upgrade

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

requestedExecutionDate.description: Indicates the date at which the payment needs to be executed as requested by the Requestor

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

currentState.description: Contains the current state of the transaction

payerProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the payer

receivedDate.description: Identifies the date on which the document was received

payerResponse.description: Contains the response provided by the payer for a request to pay message

requestedExpiryDate.description: Contains the expiry date of the request to pay message

requestorResponse.description: Contains the possible responses that the requestor can send to the payer
